casebody.data:
Town of Beech Mountain
v.
Genesis Wildlife Sanctuary, Inc. 230A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 16, 2016 Mr. Patrick H. Flanagan, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Ms. Meagan I. Kiser, Attorney at Law, Mr. Stacy C. Eggers, IV, Attorney at Law, Boone, Ms. Jaye E. Bingham-Hinch, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Town of Beech Mountain.

Mr. Charles E. Clement, Attorney at Law, Boone, Mr. John J. Korzen, Attorney at Law, For Genesis Wildlife Sanctuary, Inc.

Mr. Charles A. Brady, III, Attorney at Law, Boone.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th of August 2016 by Plaintiff to Amend New Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of August 2016."
